com.versant.util.backup
Interface StartRollforwardListener

public interface StartRollforwardListener

To signal and recover from different recoverable error conditions and warnings while rollforward archiving of database.

Method Summary
 boolean couldNotFindLogicalLog(RollforwardVisitor visitor)
          Get invoked when a logical log file could not be found.
 boolean couldNotOpenDevice(RollforwardVisitor visitor)
          Get invoked when an existing logging device could not be opened for writing.
 boolean mountNextLogDevice(RollforwardVisitor visitor)
          Get invoked when next log archive is needed.
 boolean warnArchivingAborted()
          Asks the user whether the Archiving should be aborted.
 boolean warnArchivingStarted()
          Warns the user that Rollforward Archiving is started.
 boolean warnBackupPending()
          Aat the start of the log archiving warns the user if the backup of the database is pending.
 boolean warnLoggingTerminated()
          Warns the user that Archiving has been terminated.
 

Method Detail

couldNotOpenDevice

boolean couldNotOpenDevice(RollforwardVisitor visitor)
Get invoked when an existing logging device could not be opened for writing. The method is expected to set the filename of the correct logger device.

Parameters:
visitor - The visitor object where the next device information needs to be set.
Returns:
true if the next device information is set using the visitor object, false if the logging needs to be aborted.

mountNextLogDevice

boolean mountNextLogDevice(RollforwardVisitor visitor)
Get invoked when next log archive is needed. The method is expected to set the filename of the correct log archive.

Parameters:
visitor - The visitor object where the next device information needs to be set.
Returns:
true if the next device information is set using the visitor object, false if the logging needs to be aborted.

couldNotFindLogicalLog

boolean couldNotFindLogicalLog(RollforwardVisitor visitor)
Get invoked when a logical log file could not be found. The method is expected to set the filename of the correct logical log.

Parameters:
visitor - The visitor object where the next device information needs to be set.
Returns:
true if the next device information is set using the visitor object, false if the logging needs to be aborted.

warnArchivingStarted

boolean warnArchivingStarted()
Warns the user that Rollforward Archiving is started.

Returns:
true to continue the Archiving process else false to abort it.

warnArchivingAborted

boolean warnArchivingAborted()
Asks the user whether the Archiving should be aborted.

Returns:
true to stop the Archiving process else false to continue it.

warnLoggingTerminated

boolean warnLoggingTerminated()
Warns the user that Archiving has been terminated.

Returns:
false to stop the archiving process else return true.

warnBackupPending

boolean warnBackupPending()
Aat the start of the log archiving warns the user if the backup of the database is pending.

Returns:
true to continue archiving ,false to abort it.
